summary: For decades, Congress and Medicare have worked on improving how Medicare pays health care providers to incentivize high quality, efficient care for beneficiaries. In this testimony, we discussed our prior work on Medicare's Quality Payment Program, which includes: The Merit-based Incentive Payment System, which adjusts Medicare payments based on factors like cost and quality of care The Advanced alternative payment model, in which payments can...
title: Medicare: Performance-Based and Geographic Adjustments to Physician Payments
